resources.string: Do not disturb when off wrist
Increase ring volume to hear ringtone
Play phone voice call on watch
Mobile cannot be turned on in airplane mode
You\'ve reached your mobile data limit. Resuming may lead to charges from your carrier.
Allow data usage when roaming? Significant charges may apply.
To learn how to forward calls from your phone to your watch, open this help page.
Activating this administrator will allow the app %1$s to perform the following operations:
This administrator is active and allows the app %1$s to perform the following operations:
All your Managed Google Accounts will be removed.
To provide access to your work data, your organization may change settings and install software on your device.\n\nFor more details, contact your organization\'s admin.
Types of information your organization can see
Data associated with your work account, such as email and calendar
List of apps on your device
Amount of time and data spent in each app
Changes made by your organization\'s admin
Number of apps is estimated. It may not include apps installed outside of the Play Store.
Always-on VPN turned on in your work profile
Always-on VPN turned on in your personal profile
Trusted credentials in your personal profile
Trusted credentials in your work profile
Admin can lock the device and reset password
Admin can delete all device data
Failed password attempts before deleting all device data
Failed password attempts before deleting work profile data
This device is managed by your organization.
Could not remove account from device.
Save your battery & only show the time. To exit, press the power button twice.
Only show the time. To exit, press & hold the power button to restart your watch.
This app can change the time on your device.
This app can set the global key your device.
This app can set Power Save mode.
This app can turn Airplane mode off and on.
This app can toggle Brightness boost.
This app can change the system language on your device.
This app can change ambient mode settings, including turning ambient mode off or on.
This app can access battery usage statistics.
This app can start retail mode on your device.
This app can prevent system updates.
This app can change chosen applications.
This app can show Theater mode message and go to sleep
This app can change the watch power state
This app can disable the touch screen
This app can end wet mode
This app accesses storage usage statistics.
This app can disable or enable Fitness.
This app can publish when home is ready.
This app can show the factory reset confirmation.
This app can monitor keyguard password being set
This app can enable extra cores on supported devices

Help apps find your location more quickly and accurately using Google\'s location service. Anonymous location data will be sent to Google when your device is on.\n\nThis service is active when Settings > Location is on and High Accuracy or Battery Saving mode is selected.
Unpairing will factory reset your watch settings and delete all user data.
For legal notices, see device paired with your watch

plurals.name: show_dev_countdown
plurals.item: You are now %1$d step away from being a developer.
You are now %1$d steps away from being a developer.

resources.string: No need, you are already a developer.
Status of the battery, network, and other information
Receive notifications when you\u2019re interacting with an app.
This will take effect on restart.
Make visible to other Bluetooth devices?
On when away from phone for %ds
Off when no Wi-Fi available for %dm

When Wi-Fi is enabled, your watch will automatically turn Wi-Fi on or off to save battery. It responds when: 
 
• An app requires Wi-Fi 
• Battery saver is on 
• Watch is charging 
• Watch is updating 
• Watch is away from phone 
• Watch can't connect to Wi-Fi 
• Some other situations
Connect your watch to a Wi-Fi network
No Internet access detected, won\'t automatically reconnect.
Tap to connect watch to Wi-Fi
Check your phone to finish connecting to network
Check your phone to finish set up
Connect your watch to Wi-Fi with Wear cloud sync

"Turn on Wear cloud sync to receive notifications and use voice search when you leave your phone behind. To enable this service, Wear OS data from your phone and watch will be stored on Google\'s servers. Your backed up Wi-Fi networks and passwords will be automatically sent to your watch, and your watch will stay synced even when you're not wearing it."
This input method may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s. Use this input method?
The computer\'s RSA key fingerprint is: \n%1$s
To turn screen back on, press the power button
To turn screen back on, quickly tap 3 times
Touch screen now off. Turn on with power button.
To add a new network, open the Wear OS app on your phone
To connect, enter the password on your phone
Phone is not nearby or Bluetooth is off
A screen lock is required for Android Pay
For your security, your cards will be removed if the screen lock is off for 5 minutes or more. Continue?
Auto-lock watch after you take it off?
Connect at least %d dots. Try again.
Password must be at least %d characters
PIN must be at least %d digits
Password must be fewer than %d characters.
PIN must be fewer than %d digits.
Device administrator doesn\u2019t allow using a recent PIN.
Password must contain at least one letter.
Password must contain at least one digit.
Password must contain at least one symbol.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Password must contain at least 1 letter.
Password must contain at least %d letters.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter.
Password must contain at least %d lowercase letters.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter.
Password must contain at least %d uppercase letters.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Password must contain at least 1 numerical digit.
Password must contain at least %d numerical digits.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Password must contain at least 1 special symbol.
Password must contain at least %d special symbols.

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Password must contain at least 1 non-letter character.
Password must contain at least %d non-letter characters.

resources.string: Device administrator doesn\u2019t allow using a recent password.
An ascending, descending or repeated sequence of digits is forbidden
A phone number needs to be set for this watch. Enter one now.
Once the limit is reached, mobile data will turn off.\n\nYour watch and your carrier may measure data usage differently, so consider setting a conservative limit.
SIM is locked. To place or receive a call, SIM must be unlocked.
The PIN codes do not match.
Length should be between 4 and 8 digits.
Too many SIM unlock attempts.\nContact your carrier to unlock your SIM.
Too many PUK unlock attempts.\nContact your carrier for a new SIM.
Tap to enter SIM unlock PIN
Tap to enter PUK PIN and set up new SIM PIN
Contact your carrier for a new SIM. Too many PUK unlock attempts.
Unanswered calls to your phone will forward to your watch (%s). Your phone must be on to activate this feature.
Usage access allows an app to track what other apps you\u2019re using and how often, as well as your carrier, language settings, and other details.
This feature allows an app to display on top of other apps you\u2019re using. It may interfere with your use of those apps or change the way they seem to appear or behave.
This permission allows an app to modify system settings.
All this app\'s data will be permanently deleted. This include all files, settings, accounts, databases, etc.
Data paused for rest of cycle
Activating this administrator will allow the app %1$s to perform the following operations:
This action is disabled. Contact your organization\'s administrator to learn more.
You need to set a lock screen PIN or password before you can use credential storage.

resources.string: Screen locks can make your watch more secure. Your watch will auto-lock when you take it off. You can change it later in settings.
This app can change proxy connection settings.
This bug report is being shared with your IT admin. Contact them for more details.
Your IT admin requested a bug report to help troubleshoot this device. Apps and data may be shared.
Your IT admin requested a bug report to help troubleshoot this device. Apps and data may be shared, and your device may temporarily slow down.
